mapper.select: select id, user_no userNo, user_name userName, user_pwd userPwd, user_phone userPhone, post_id postId, depart_id departId, user_photo userPhoto , DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createTime, DATE_FORMAT(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') updateTime, DATE_FORMAT(login_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') loginTime, user_status userStatus from sys_users where user_no= #{userNo} and user_pwd= #{userPwd}
